contentencoded:
This final note today, which comes with a reminder that iOS 7 is upon us. iPad and iPhones the world over are being updated with the new operating system. I can tell you firsthand it's quite a change.

For grownups, of course. Also, the children who use their parents' gadgets. Including, I kid you not, this four year old, whose dad updated yesterday.

You feel bad, right?

teaser: Apple's new operating system upgrades on iPhones and iPads means change for many.
title: iOS 7 hate starts young
description: Apple's new operating system upgrades on iPhones and iPads means change for many.
